title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.28 - Race declared off
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.28 - Race declared off

State Regulations

In the case of a race being declared off or postponed to
another day by the judges after the wagering has begun, all money wagered in
that race shall be refunded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
